articles.title: Kim Jong Il Receives Delegation of CPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Receives Delegation of CPC
 Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and chairman of the National Defence Commission of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, on Monday received a delegation of the Communist Party of China led by Zhou Yongkang, member of the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee and secretary of the Central Commission of Politics and Law of the CPC, on a visit to the DPRK.
					 Present there were Kim Yong Il and Kim Yang Gon, alternate members of the Political Bureau and secretaries of the Central Committee of the WPK.
					
					 On behalf of the collective leadership of the CPC including General Secretary Hu Jintao, Zhou Yongkang once again warmly congratulated Kim Jong Il on the successful holding of the WPK conference and on his reelection as general secretary of the WPK and on its 65th birthday. Then he presented Kim Jong Il with a gift prepared by the delegation.
					
					 He thanked for this and asked Zhou Yongkang to convey his greetings to the collective leadership of the CPC including Hu Jintao. Kim Jong Il had a warm and friendly talk with Zhou Yongkang. 
					
					 After receiving him, Kim Jong Il hosted a luncheon for the guests.

articles.title: Chinese Party Delegation Wraps up Its Visit to DPRK
articles.content:
Chinese Party Delegation Wraps up Its Visit to DPRK
Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Communist Party of China led by Zhou Yongkang, member of the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee and secretary of the Central Commission of Politics and Law of the CPC, left for home Monday after paying an official goodwill visit to the DPRK at the invitation of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea. 
					 It was seen off at the airport by Kim Ki Nam and Choe Thae Bok, members of Political Bureau and secretaries of the Central Committee of the WPK, Kim Yong Il, alternate member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the C.C., the WPK, and Ju Yong Sik, chief secretary of the Jagang Provincial Committee of the WPK, Kim Song Nam, vice department director of the C.C, the WPK, Kim Song Gi, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, and Ku Pon Thae, vice-minister of Foreign Trade. 
					
					 It was also seen off by Liu Hongcai, Chinese ambassador to the DPRK, and staff members of his embassy. 
					
					 During its stay in the DPRK the delegation visited Mangyongdae, the Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace and the Taedonggang Combined Fruit Farm.

articles.title: Gift from Secretary of Jilin Provincial Committee of CPC
articles.content:
Gift from Secretary of Jilin Provincial Committee of CPC
Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by Sun Zhengcai, secretary of the Jilin Provincial Committee of the Community Party of China, on a visit to the DPRK.
					 The gift was handed to an official concerned Monday by the secretary.

articles.title: Senior Officials of WPK Meet Foreign Guests
articles.content:
Senior Officials of WPK Meet Foreign Guests 
Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- Kim Ki Nam, member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Monday met and had a talk with Vishwanath, director-general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea and secretary general of the International Kim Il Sung Prize Council, Kenichi Ogami, secretary general of the IIJI, and heads of delegations of Juche idea study organizations of different countries and regions. 
					 The director-general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea said that they were greatly pleased with leader Kim Jong Il's reelection as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 Noting that it is the desire of the world progressives advocating independence to study the Juche idea, he reiterated his will to more actively study and disseminate the Juche idea.
					
					 Kim Yong Il, alternate member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, met and had a talk with Kanji Inoki, president of the Inoki Genom Joint Co., Ltd. of Japan, and his party who participated in the celebrations of the 65th birthday of the WPK on the same day.

articles.title: Art Performance Given in Celebration of WPK Birthday
articles.content:
Art Performance Given in Celebration of WPK Birthday
 Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- A music and dance performance was given by the State Folk Art Troupe at the East Pyongyang Grand Theatre Monday to celebrate the 65th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 It was appreciated by senior officials of the party, army and state, the chairperson of a friendly party, officials of the party, armed forces and power organs, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, working people in the city, congratulatory groups, delegations and home-visiting groups of overseas Koreans from various regions including the congratulatory group of Koreans in Japan, the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front, diplomatic envoys of different countries and representatives of international organizations here and foreign guests.
					
					 Put on the stage were female vocal solo "General Kim Il Sung Is Our Sun" and "We Sing of the Party", female quartet "Do Prosper, Era of the Workers' Party", female trio "Ongheya for Songun Victory", dance "Yangsando", female vocal solo "When Thinking of the Path of Songun", chorus "Let Us Extend Glory to the Our Great Party" and other colorful numbers.
					
					 The performers sang high praises of the immortal revolutionary exploits President Kim Il Sung performed by starting and leading the cause of building a revolutionary party and laying a solid foundation for the prosperity of Songun Korea under the banner of the Juche idea, the Songun idea and those leader Kim Jong Il has performed by developing the WPK into the eternal party of the President and a powerful guiding force for the Songun revolution.
					
					 Also put on the stage were Kayagum ensemble "Vinalon of 3 000-ri", mixed duet and chorus "Juche Iron Is the Best", song and dance "Push Back the Frontiers of Latest Science and Technology", chorus "Arirang of Prosperity" and other numbers which impressively dealt with the reality of the DPRK in which the era of prosperity of the Workers' Party was ushered in on this land under the wise leadership of the Party and all ideals of the people have been fully materialized.

articles.title: Gift from President of Japanese Company
articles.content:
Gift from President of Japanese Company 
 Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by the visiting president of the Inoki Genom Joint Co., Ltd. of Japan on occasion of the 65th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea. 
					 It was handed to Kim Yong Il, alternate member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, by Kanji Inoki, president of the Inoki Genom Joint Co., Ltd. of Japan, on Monday.

articles.title: Gift from Hong Kong, China, Phoenix Satellite TV Holdings Ltd.
articles.content:
Gift from Hong Kong, China, Phoenix Satellite TV Holdings Ltd.
 Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by the Phoenix Satellite TV Holdings Ltd. of Hong Kong of China on occasion of the 65th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea. 
					 It was handed to an official concerned by head of the delegation Wang Jiyan, executive vice-chairperson of the Phoenix Satellite TV Holdings Ltd. of Hong Kong, China and director for the Chinese Language Broadcasting on a visit to the DPRK on Monday.

articles.title: Floral Basket and Gift
articles.content:
Floral Basket and Gift
 Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) --General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a floral basket by the director of the International Institute of the Juche Idea and his party and a gift by a delegation of the Polish Organization for the Study of the Juche idea on a visit to the DPRK on the occasion of the 65th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The floral basket and gift were separately handed to an official concerned by Takao Kamakura and Jacek Poniewierski on Monday.

articles.title: Joint Friendly Gathering Held
articles.content:
Joint Friendly Gathering Held
Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- A joint friendly gathering with delegations and delegates of Juche idea study organizations took place on Monday. 
					 Present there were Vishwanath, secretary general of the International Kim Il Sung Prize Council and director-general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea , and delegations and delegates of Juche idea study organizations in different countries and regions participating in the celebrations of the 65th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea. 
					
					 Members of the Social Scientists Society of Korea were present there.
					
					 The participants talked to one another about the need to intensify the study and dissemination of the Juche idea and had diverse sports and amusement games, deepening the friendship.

articles.title: WPK Steers Country to Prosperity
articles.content:
WPK Steers Country to Prosperity
Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- The Korean people, including the servicepersons, have celebrated the 65th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 On this occasion they pay the highest tribute to President Kim Il Sung for the imperishable feats he performed for the prosperity of the country, vowing to realize his desire for the building of a thriving nation without fail.
					
					 He started revolutionary activities in his early years with a high aim to build a strong independent and prosperous nation and explored a new way of building a Juche-typed revolutionary party. 
					
					 He founded the WPK on October 10, Juche 34 (1945) to accelerate the sacred cause of the building of a powerful socialist country started by the President in Mt. Paektu.
					
					 Under its wise leadership the army and state building was successfully carried out after the liberation of the country from the Japanese imperialists' colonial rule and the country developed into a socialist state, eliminating the centuries-old backwardness and penury through the great advance of Chollima (a legendary horse running 400 kilometers a day) and displaying the might of heroic Korea.
					
					 The cause of the building of a thriving nation has been successfully carried forward by Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the WPK.
					
					 He, with an unshakable will to turn Korea into a dignified, prosperous and powerful socialist country, has devoted himself to realizing the President's desire for scores of years.
					
					 After starting the Songun revolutionary leadership in the 1960s, he has brought about a fresh turn in political, military, economic, cultural and all other fields of the revolution and construction, ushering in a great heyday of the WPK era in the 1970s and 1980s.
					
					 A great leap unprecedented in the history of the nation has been witnessed in the Songun era under Kim Jong Il's outstanding and veteran leadership for the building of a thriving nation.

articles.title: WPK's Birthday Observed in Different Countries
articles.content:
WPK's Birthday Observed in Different Countries
 Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- Meetings took place in Laos, Kyrgyzstan and Bulgaria and an opening ceremony of a Korean book, photo and handicraft exhibition in China from Oct. 4 to 9 on the occasion of the 65th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					On display in the venue of the exhibition were photos showing the undying feats President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il performed by providing the great tradition of the DPRK-China friendship together with China's leaders of several generations and more than 1 200 books, photos and handiworks introducing the struggle of the armies and peoples of the two countries who struggled in the same trench against the U.S. imperialist aggressors, the struggle of the Korean people for building a thriving nation and the time-honored history and brilliant culture of the Korean nation.
					
					 Speeches were made at the meetings.
					
					 A message of greetings to Kim Jong Il was adopted at the meeting held in Bulgaria.
					
					 A seminar and a film show were held by the Central Committee of the Brazilian Communist Party and a lecture took place in Campinas City of Sao Paulo State between Sept. 29 and 30 to congratulate Kim Jong Il on his reelection as general secretary of the WPK, commemorate the 65th birthday of the WPK and the 84th anniversary of the formation of the Down-with-Imperialism Union.

articles.title: Will to Boost Friendly Relations with WPK Reiterated by Equatorial Guinean  Party Leader
articles.content:
Will to Boost Friendly Relations with WPK Reiterated by Equatorial Guinean Party Leader
 Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- Lucas Nguema Esono, general secretary of the Democratic Party of Equatorial Guinea, issued a statement on Oct. 5 on the occasion of the 65th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The general secretary referred to the fact that over the past 65 years the WPK has achieved shining successes in the struggle to build a new society, achieve the country's independence and defend its sovereignty.
					
					 The Democratic Party of Equatorial Guinea will as ever express full support and solidarity with the WPK in its efforts to achieve national reunification and boost the friendly relations with the WPK, the general secretary concluded.

articles.title: Greetings to President of Equatorial Guinea
articles.content:
Greetings to President of Equatorial Guinea 
 Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, on Oct. 7 sent a message of greetings to Obiang Nguema Mbasogo, president of Equatorial Guinea, on the occasion of the 42nd anniversary of its independence.
					 Expressing belief that the good relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would grow stronger in the common interests, the message sincerely wished the friendly people of Equatorial Guinea steady socio-economic development and prosperity.

articles.title: European Regional Seminar on DPRK Held in Denmark
articles.content:
European Regional Seminar on DPRK Held in Denmark
Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- A European regional seminar on the DPRK was held in Denmark on Oct. 2 on the occasion of the 65th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Present there were the chairman of the Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK, the delegate President of the France-Korea Friendship Association and the secretary general of the International Liaison Committee for Reunification and Peace in Korea, who are co-chairmen of the international preparatory committee for commemorating the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung, and figures of the Sweden-Korea Friendship Association, the Finland-Korea Society, the Denmark-DPRK Friendship Association, the Westfold Provincial Committee of the Communist Party of Norway, the Switzerland-Korea Committee, the Ukraine-DPRK Association, the Permanent Committee of the Belarus-DPRK National Friend Association Named After Kim Il Sung, the British Friendship Society with Korea, the Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain and political parties and organizations in Denmark and other Danes.
					
					 Present there on invitation was the delegation of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries which was visiting Denmark.
					
					 The chairman of the Sweden-Korea Friendship Association said in a keynote report made at the seminar that the WPK has led the Korean people for 65 years with its correct strategy, tactics, line and policies, imbuing them with the pride and self-esteem of being a heroic people winning great victories and turning the DPRK into a powerful independent country, remaining unperturbed by any trial and before any formidable enemy.
					
					 The DPRK has turned into a powerful socialist country, independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence, working world-startling miracles under the leadership of the Party, he noted, adding:
					
					 President Kim Il Sung gave origin to the cause of building a party of Juche type and led it to victory. This cause has been successfully carried forward by General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Then followed speeches made by various figures on the themes of "The WPK is the great party of Kim Il Sung, Comrade Kim Jong Il", "The historical roots of the WPK", "Benevolent policy of the WPK", "The WPK, guide of revolution and construction", "Songun leadership of the WPK is an ever-victorious banner", etc.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Il was adopted at the seminar.
					
					 The letter noted that the seminar offered a meaningful occasion to know better about the glorious history of the WPK, shining feats of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and the master key and source that enabled the WPK to win only victories generation after generation.
					
					 The 65 year-long history of the WPK is a glorious history of the great guide in which it rallied the popular masses as one to courageously weather trials and difficulties and build a dignified and powerful socialist state under the wise leadership of the outstanding leaders, it stressed, adding:
					
					 All the achievements and experience gained by the WPK are entirely thanks to the outstanding and test leadership of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and serve as a precious example to be followed by all the parties struggling for the people's independence.
					
					 It reiterated the participants' will to extend full support and firm solidarity to the WPK and the Korean people in their just cause in the future, too, as in the past.

articles.title: Agreement on Friendship and Scientific Exchange and Cooperation Signed
articles.content:
Agreement on Friendship and Scientific Exchange and Cooperation Signed 
Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- An agreement on friendship and scientific exchange and cooperation between Pyongyang University of Mechanical Engineering and the "Luis Vargas Torres" Esmeraldas University of Technology in Ecuador was signed at the People's Palace of Culture on Monday. 
					 Present there were Pang Sun Chol, rector of Pyongyang University of Mechanical Engineering, So Ho Won, chairman of the DPRK-Ecuator Friendship Association, and others and Alfonso Murgueytio, vice-president of the "Luis Vargas Torres" Esmeraldas University of Technology in Ecuador, and his party.
					
					 The agreement was inked by Pang Sun Chol and Alfonso Murgueytio.

articles.title: Conveying Honorary Professorship to Three Commanders of Mt. Paektu
articles.content:
Conveying Honorary Professorship to Three Commanders of Mt. Paektu
 Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- A ceremony of conveying honorary professorship to President Kim Il Sung, General Secretary Kim Jong Il and anti-Japanese heroine Kim Jong Suk awarded by the "Luis Vargas Torres" Esmeraldas University of Technology in Ecuador was held at the People's Palace of Culture Monday on the occasion of the 65th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea. 
					 Present there were Mun Jae Chol, vice-chairman of the Korean Society for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, So Ho Won, chairman of the DPRK-Ecuador Friendship Association, officials concerned and Alfonso Murgueytio, vice-president of the "Luis Vargas Torres" Esmeraldas University of Technology in Ecuador, and his party on a visit to the DPRK for participating in the celebrations of the 65th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 The certificates of honorary professorship were conveyed to Mun Jae Chol by Alfonso Murgueytio.

articles.title: Actos en varios paises por 65th aniversario del PTC
articles.content:
Actos en varios paises por 65th aniversario del PTC
Pyongyang, 11 de octubre (ATCC) -- En ocasion del 65? aniversario de la fundacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, tuvieron lugar del dia 4 al 9 el mitin en Laos, Kirguizistan y Bulgaria y la ceremonia inaugural de la exposicion de libros, fotos y bordados y productos de artes menores de Corea en China.
					  En la sede de exhibicion fueron expuestos las fotos alusivas a las hazanas inmortales del Presidente  Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, quienes forjaron la gran tradicion de la amistad Corea-China junto con los dirigentes chinos de diferentes generaciones, los libros, las fotos y mas de 1200 bordados y artesanias que demuestran la lucha de los ejercitos y los pueblos de los dos paises, que combatieron en la misma trinchera contra los agresores imperialistas yanquis, la del pueblo coreano por construir una gran potencia prospera y la larga historia y la cultura brillante de la nacion coreana.
					
					  En los mitines hubo discursos.
					
					  En el mitin efectuado en Bulgaria fue aprobado un mensaje de felicitacion al Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					  Por otra parte, con motivo de la reeleccion del Dirigente como Secretario General del PTC, el 65? aniversario de la fundacion del PTC y del 84? aniversario de la fundacion de la Union para Derrotar al Imperialismo (UDI), se realizaron los dias 29 y 30 de septiembre el simposio y la proyeccion filmica en el Comite Central del Partido Comunista de Brasil y la conferencia en la ciudad de Campinas del estado de Sao Paulo.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il recibe presente de la TV de Satelite Ave Fenix de Hong Kong
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il recibe presente de la TV de Satelite Ave Fenix de Hong Kong
Pyongyang, 11 de octubre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il recibio presente que le dirigiera la TV de Satelite Ave Fenix de Hong Kong, China, en ocasion de 65o aniversario de la fundacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					  El regalo fue entregado el dia 11 a un funcionario coreano por el Wang Jiyan, vicepresidente ejecutivo y director de Television en Lengua China, de visita a Corea.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il recibe el regalo de Kanji Inoki
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il recibe el regalo de Kanji Inoki 
Pyongyang, 11 de octubre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il recibio regalo que le dirigiera Kanji Inoki, presidente de la Sociedad Anonima Inoki Genom de Japon, de visita a Corea en ocasion del 65o aniversario de la fundacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					  Kanji Inoki lo entrego el dia 11 a Kim Yong Il, miembro suplente del Buro Politico y secretario del CC del PTC.

articles.title: Efectuado encuentro de amistad con partidarios de la idea Juche
articles.content:
Efectuado encuentro de amistad con partidarios de la idea Juche
Pyongyang, 11 de octubre (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 11 el encuentro de amistad con las delegaciones y delegados de las organizaciones de estudio de la idea Juche.
					  En la ocasion participaron Vishwanath, secretario general del Consejo del Premio Internacional       Kim Il Sung y director general del Instituto Internacional de la Idea Juche (IIIJ) y otras delegaciones y delegados de las organizaciones de estudio de la idea Juche de varios paises y regiones que participaron en los actos festivos por el 65o aniversario de la fundacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea. 
					
					  Tambien, estuvieron presentes los miembros de la Asociacion Coreana de Hombres de Ciencias Sociales.
					
					  Los participantes hablaron de la necesidad de profundizar mas el estudio y la propaganda de la idea Juche e hicieron mas intimo el sentimiento amistoso realizando diversos juegos deportivos y recreativos.
